content: *put three of my paid patterns into your cart and get the cheapest one free * *one single cable with a garter pattern at the edges this cowl pattern knits up in no time held together with a shawl pin or sew the edges together * **yarn used** king cole big value super chunky 1 ball shade fern **needle** uk10mm/us15 straight **notions** cable needle or stitch holder **gauge** 10sts-15rows-10cms-blocked garter stitch **finished measurements after blocking** length-62cms width-15cms
